title: Scan via Chrome browser URL seems to cache redirect and return to wrong location
body:
I am developing web application for custom scan and search products from custom database. 
It seems that zxing cache and redirect to wrong location.
I made a test with that link: http://www.tx9.co.uk/zxingtest.php on my:
Nexus 5 android 5.1.1 and
Asus MemoPad HD7 4.4.2

but still redirects to wrong location. For example:
When a go to a.php and scan - redirect to a.php
after that I go to b.php and scan - redirect to b.php
after that I go to a.php and scan - redirect to b.php - Not correct.

I cleared cache but still not working correctly.

I even tested that build : https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B_hfrkaWlLi4cVd2WWEtb21FTzA/view?usp=sharing  

but result is the same.

node.body:
I did a few tests on my Asus memo pad 7:
First test:

Chrome Version:  36.0.1985.135
Android Version :  4.4.2

When I go to scan a barcode and get back to php file I notice that barcode scanner doesn't stay open it's closed automatically. 

If you make new scan, barcode scanner opens again and after scan it's closes.

But this is only on old chrome version like 36.

---

Second test:
Chrome Version:  43.0.2357.92
Android Version :  4.4.2

---

Barcode scanner stays open no matter what and when you returned from scan, it redirects you to the wrong place.

I think one of the fixes for this case could be:
If there is an option to close barcode scanner after successful scan and returned to php, just like old version of chrome 36 could resolve this problem.
